PLCrashReportExceptionInfo Class Reference

If a crash is triggered by an uncaught Objective-C exception, the exception name and reason will be made available. More...

NSString * exceptionName
 The exception name.
NSString * exceptionReason
 The exception reason.

Detailed Description

If a crash is triggered by an uncaught Objective-C exception, the exception name and reason will be made available.
